TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISharePointCommandLogger

summary.span: 表示 SharePoint 命令的日志记录服务。

span.span: Represents the logging service for SharePoint commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用日志记录服务，可以用于将消息写入到的 SharePoint 命令**输出**窗口或**错误列表**窗口。The logging service enables SharePoint commands to write messages to the **Output** window or **Error List** window. 在**输出**窗口中，所有消息均都写入**SharePoint 工具**输出窗格中，如果从部署扩展编写消息除外。In the **Output** window, all messages are written to the **SharePoint Tools** output pane, except when writing messages from deployment extensions. 在部署扩展中，消息会写入到**生成**输出窗格。In deployment extensions, messages are written to the **Build** output pane.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteLine(string message, valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory category) cil managed

span.span: The message text.

param.name: category

span.span: The category of the message.

param.span: 这指定消息是否在“输出”窗口和/或“错误列表”窗口中显示，以及消息在“错误列表”窗口的何处显示。

span.span: This specifies whether the message appears in the **Output** window or **Error List** window (or both), and where the message appears in the **Error List** window.

summary.span: 将消息写入具有指定类别的“输出”窗口或“错误列表”窗口。

span.span: Writes a message to the **Output** window or **Error List** window with the specified category.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteLine (string message, Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory category, string helpKeyword);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteLine(string message, valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory category, string helpKeyword) cil managed

span.span: The message text.

param.name: category

span.span: The category of the message.

param.span: 这指定消息是否在“输出”窗口和/或“错误列表”窗口中显示，以及消息在“错误列表”窗口的何处显示。

span.span: This specifies whether the message appears in the **Output** window or **Error List** window (or both), and where the message appears in the **Error List** window.
The Help keyword for the error.

summary.span: 将消息写入具有指定类别和“帮助”关键字的“输出”窗口或“错误列表”窗口。

span.span: Writes a message to the **Output** window or **Error List** window with the specified category and Help keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteLine (string message, Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory category, string filePath, int lineNumber, int columnNumber);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteLine(string message, valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory category, string filePath, int32 lineNumber, int32 columnNumber) cil managed

span.span: The message text.

param.name: category

span.span: The category of the message.

param.span: 这指定消息是否在“输出”窗口和/或“错误列表”窗口中显示，以及消息在“错误列表”窗口的何处显示。

span.span: This specifies whether the message appears in the **Output** window or **Error List** window (or both), and where the message appears in the **Error List** window.

param.name: filePath
param.span: 具有错误或警告的文件的完整路径。

span.span: The full path to the file with the error or warning.
The line number of the error or warning.
The column number of the error or warning.

summary.span: 将消息写入具有指定类别和错误位置信息的“输出”窗口或“错误列表”窗口。

span.span: Writes a message to the **Output** window or **Error List** window with the specified category and error location information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]写入 IDE，如**错误**窗口中，则`lineNumber`和`columnNumber`值是从零开始，但当用户代码写入 IDE，则值都基于 1。When [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] writes to the IDE, such as the **Error** window, then the `lineNumber` and `columnNumber` values are zero-based, but when user code writes to the IDE, then the values are one-based. 这意味着，如果，例如，你指定`lineNumber`的 10 和`columnNumber`在代码中，20 的[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]它所报告的第 11 行和列 21。This means that if, for example, you specify a `lineNumber` of 10 and a `columnNumber` of 20 in your code, [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] reports it as line 11 and column 21.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WriteLine (string message, Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Commands.LogCategory category, string filePath, int lineNumber, int columnNumber, string helpKeyword);

param.name: filePath

The line number of the error or warning.

The Help keyword for the error.

summary.span: 将消息写入具有指定类别、错误位置信息和“帮助”关键字的“输出”窗口或“错误列表”窗口。

span.span: Writes a message to the **Output** window or **Error List** window with the specified category, error location information, and Help keyword.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]写入 IDE，如**错误**窗口中，则`lineNumber`和`columnNumber`值是从零开始，但当用户代码写入 IDE，则值都基于 1。When [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] writes to the IDE, such as the **Error** window, then the `lineNumber` and `columnNumber` values are zero-based, but when user code writes to the IDE, then the values are one-based. 这意味着，如果，例如，你指定`lineNumber`的 10 和`columnNumber`在代码中，20 的[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]它所报告的第 11 行和列 21。This means that if, for example, you specify a `lineNumber` of 10 and a `columnNumber` of 20 in your code, [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] reports it as line 11 and column 21.
